## Shape.Basic type

[https://drafts.csswg.org/css-shapes/\#typedef-basic-shape](https://drafts.csswg.org/css-shapes/#typedef-basic-shape)

**Signature:**

```typescript
type Basic = Circle | Ellipse | Inset | Polygon | Rectangle;
```
